Name: Basic Attack
Description: Default melee attack. Deals 5 physical damage to a single target.

Name: Weaken
Description: Target deals 30% less damage over the next 4 seconds.

Name: Single Target Melee
Description: Deals 50 physical damage to a single target.

Name: Single Target Ranged
Description: Deals 50 ranged damage to a single target.

Name: Melee Cleave
Description: Deals 35 physical damage to two separate targets.

Name: Cleave Ranged
Description: Deals 35 ranged damage to two separate targets.

Name: Poison/DoT
Description: Inflicts a poison status effect on an enemy which deals 1 damage per second. This effect stacks.

Name: Heal
Description: Increases an ally's health by 16 every second. Channelled over 4 seconds.

Name: Shield
Description: Shields a single ally from 40 damage.

Name: Sacrifice/Guard
Description: Shares 50% of all damage taken by an ally for X seconds.

Name: Buff
Description: Increases an ally's attribute.

Name: Debuff
Description: Weakens an opponent during the duration.

Name: Interrupt
Description: Interrupts an opponents channelled ability.

Name: Silence
Description: Prevents target from casting spells for 3 seconds. Can also interrupt.

Name: Confuse
Description: Target can't identify friend from foe for 3 seconds.

Name: Demoralize
Description: Target receives 30% more damage over the next 3 seconds.

Name: Rampage
Description: An ally receives a 40% attack speed increase for the next 4 seconds.

Name: Flurry
Description: Character does 4 attacks in quick succession.

Name: Reflect
Description: Character reflects all attacks against him over the next 3 seconds.

Name: Esuna/Cleanse
Description: Removes an ally's Poison/DoT. Channelled over 4 seconds.

Name: GenericAbility
Description: This is a generic ability
